column1: Purpose: Represents a farm entity managed by users

column3: Links to the User who owns the farm
Geographical location or address of the farm
Size of the farm in acres or hectares
Timestamp when the farm was added
Timestamp when the farm details were last updated

column1: A Farm belongs to one User (Many-to-One)
A Farm can have multiple Crops or Livestock (One-to-Many)
Purpose: Details specific crops grown on a farm

column3: Links to the Farm where the crop is grown
Date when the crop was planted
Expected or actual date of harvest
Amount planted (e.g., in kilograms or number of plants)
Additional information or observations about the crop

column1: A Crop belongs to one Farm (Many-to-One)
Purpose: Details specific livestock raised on a farm

column3: Unique identifier for each livestock entry
Links to the Farm where the livestock is raised
Date when the livestock was acquired
Current health status of the livestock

column1: Purpose: Represents employees managed under HR module

column3: Links to the User if the employee has system access
Links to the Farm where the employee works
Job title or role within the farm

column1: An Employee is linked to one Farm (Many-to-One)
An Employee may be linked to a User account (Many-to-One)
Purpose: Represents all users of the system including farmers, employees, and administrators

column3: User's email address, used for login and communication
Securely hashed password for user authentication
Defines the user's role (e.g., Farmer, Employee, Admin)
Timestamp when the user account was created
Timestamp when the user account was last updated

column1: A User can own multiple Farms (One-to-Many)
